attributes.action: Limit the amount of Housing benefit payable to people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the case of the Afghan family living in a 1.2 million pound home. This is a smack in the face to the millions of taxpayers like ourselves who work, and are finding it increasingly harder to makes ends meet. If councils can't rehouse non british people then they should send then back home.

rejection.details: Full name required to post a petition
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
